```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(broom)
library(lubridate)
```

# Train Data
```{r}
train_raw <- read_csv("train.csv")
```

What is the study period?
```{r}
range(train_raw$Date)
train_raw %>%
  pull(Date) %>%
  range() %>%
  diff()
```
WNV Detection Trend
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
train_raw %>%
  group_by(Date) %>%
  summarise(WNV_in_year = sum(WnvPresent)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Date, y = WNV_in_year)) +
  geom_point()
```
